attributes.action: Tell us why the McCanns have not been charged under the Children and Young Persons Act 1933 (c.12) Part 1 Prevention of Cruelty and Exposure to Moral and Physical Danger
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is about getting Justice for Madeline McCann. This little girl was not asked if she wanted to be put in Mortal Danger nor did her parents seem to care.If as they say they were not involved in her abduction THEY THEMSELVES CREATED THE SITUATION and are therfore GUILTY of the above offence.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
